entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Taloyoak
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 1:51 PM MST Saturday 21 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Ice Crystals, -33.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Taloyoak Airport 8:34 PM MST Saturday 21 January 2023
Condition: Ice Crystals
Temperature: -33.9°C
Pressure: 100.5 kPa
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 71 %
Wind Chill: -38
Dewpoint: -37.3°C
Wind: N 3 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday night: A few clouds. Low minus 43.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 43. Wind chill minus 39 this evening and minus 51 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 2:00 PM MST Saturday 21 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: A few clouds. High minus 35.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy late in the morning. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h in the afternoon. High minus 35. Wind chill minus 55 in the morning and minus 47 in the afternoon. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 2:00 PM MST Saturday 21 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: A few clouds. Low minus 38.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Clearing near midnight. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light after midnight. Low minus 38. Wind chill minus 53 in the evening and minus 45 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 2:00 PM MST Saturday 21 January 2023
